Text.Page:
No time for chitchat. We're busy repairing the camp fences.

Strong timber would certainly help, but you've heard this song and dance before.

The best wood in Balder's Refuge is just walking aroundâ€”in the form of {@LinkCreature:30#170#viny arbosks}.

No other tree is that durable, so it's worth the risk.

You live up to your reputation, .

No one's ever brought me so much wood before.

Hey! Come here and take this! And thank you so much.
The wood of {@LinkCreature:30#170#viny arbosks} is so hard that an axe-wielding, rampaging orcan can't hack it apart. I'd never sleep here if I didn't trust these walls.
